text: Va in guna ʙud, ki sarikoni onho [az sajotinu ʙutho] dar nazari ʙisjore az musrikon [ki faqir ʙudand] qatli farzandonasonro orostand [va zeʙo cilva dodand], to halokason kunand va oinasonro ʙar onon [osufta va] mustaʙah sozand.Va agar Alloh taolo mexost, cunin namekardand, pas, [ej pajomʙar, tu niz] ononro ʙo [tuhmatu] duruƣhojason voguzor
